a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in share of global CO₂ emissions and population, 100 to 2021
Carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions from fossil fuels and industry. Land-use change is not included.
Data source: Global Carbon Budget (2023); HYDE (2023); Gapminder (2022); UN WPP (2024)
